name: PKPaymentRequestCouponCodeUpdate
desc: An object that updates the payment request after the coupon code changes.

items.name: init(errors: [Error]?, paymentSummaryItems: [PKPaymentSummaryItem], shippingMethods: [PKShippingMethod])
items.desc: Creates a payment coupon update with your specified payment summary items, errors, and shipping methods.

items.name: var errors: [Error]!
items.desc: An array of errors for the coupon code that the user must resolve.
